briefing.description: A black woman named Donna Williams was assaulted and abandoned near backstreets of a suspect’s home. She was bleeding and seemed like she was beaten with a weapon multiple times.

conclusion.speaker: player
conclusion.text: We cannot be obvious of someone’s gender by their looks.

conclusion.text: It was based on the police database. She was recorded as a woman there, and I just cited it. Oh, I see the record that she changed her gender last week.

conclusion.text: I see, she is a transgender. Now let’s see why this man has beaten her.

conclusion.speaker: ai
conclusion.text: He is Scott Miller, who lives near the backstreet. He attended the same elementary school with the victim.

conclusion.text: And what kind of hives are these on the victim’s hand?

conclusion.text: I analyzed that this is an allergic reaction caused by animal protein. In this case, it seems like she took milk powder.

conclusion.speaker: ai
conclusion.text: It also seems like this allergic reaction made the victim indefensible for assault. She would have known about her allergic reaction.

conclusion.speaker: player
conclusion.text: Animal protein? Milk powder? Production and use of animal products is completely illegal, as you know.

conclusion.speaker: player
conclusion.text: Then maybe… the suspect used milk powder intentionally to make her vulnerable.

conclusion.speaker: player
conclusion.text: Since they knew each other for a long time, maybe he knew that she is allergic to dairy products.

conclusion.speaker: player
conclusion.text: We should interrogate the suspect and ask him why he planned the crime.

conclusion.speaker: ai
conclusion.text: As a result of interrogation, it was found out that he knew about her allergy and put some milk powder in her dish in advance to make her indefensible.

conclusion.speaker: ai
conclusion.text: He said he was upset because of his best friend coming out as a transgender woman, few days before the crime.

conclusion.speaker: player
conclusion.text: Coming out. Okay. Then it seems like he planned to beat her just because she’s a transgender and he couldn’t accept it.

conclusion.speaker: player
conclusion.text: This is called hate crime.

conclusion.speaker: ai
conclusion.text: Hate crime. I will take note of that and learn more about it.

conclusion.speaker: player
conclusion.text: Okay. So we found the motive of the crime. But hey… how did he get the milk powder? It’s illegal.

conclusion.speaker: player
conclusion.text: Does it mean there is someone who sells those kinds of products?

final: Donna Williams, black transgender woman, was assaulted by her close friend, Scott Miller, white man, after coming out as a transgender. Therefore, this is an assault case but also a hate crime. The suspect bought and added milk powder in the victim’s food as he knew that she is allergic to animal products. The reason why he invited her for dinner was to make her indefensible and beat her. Further investigation on the milk powder that the suspect used is needed.
